name: VR SUP
summary: The Virtual Reality Stand Up Paddleboard (SUP) simulation provides a safe environment where anyone can succeed, from the first-time user to the most seasoned paddler. VR SUP brings the watercraft experience to your headset as you paddle across a calm lake. Birds soar above as you explore your surroundings on a clear and warm day. Practice paddling forward and backwards while steering your SUP to the left and right, safely passing ducks and other watercraft along the way. Haptic feedback in each...
